name: Moyer Aviation, Inc
about: Moyer Aviation, Inc., located at the Pocono Mountain Regional Airport in Tobyhanna, PA, is a renowned provider of aviation services with over 25 years of experience. Our flight school offers advanced FAA Part 141 training programs, affiliations with Liberty University’s School of Aeronautics and Lehigh Carbon Community College, allowing students to pursue professional pilot degrees. We provide comprehensive training from private to ATP certificates, including instrument, commercial, and multiengine ratings. Our highly credentialed instructors use state-of-the-art Cessna aircraft and computerized training programs. Moyer Aviation also offers charter services, aircraft sales, maintenance, and rentals, ensuring a holistic aviation experience. With a strong focus on safety, customer satisfaction, and service excellence, Moyer Aviation is your gateway to a successful aviation career.

Our facility maintains its own fleet of aircraft and provides hangar space and aircraft sales. The school is part of a vibrant aviation community, supported by the La Porte Aero Club, which promotes education and awards scholarships to aspiring pilots. With a focus on professional and hands-on training, La Porte Aviation Services is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals in a supportive and experienced environment.

We offer world-class flight training programs led by certified instructors using modern, technically advanced aircraft such as the Cirrus SR20, Piper Seminole, and Cessna 172. Contact us to learn more about our flight training programs.

name: Ponderosa Aero Club, Inc.
about: Ponderosa Aero Club, Inc., established in 1974, is a renowned flight school and flying club based at the Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field in Boise, Idaho. With a stellar safety record and a large fleet of well-maintained aircraft, including Cessna 172s and Piper Archers, the club offers comprehensive training programs for private pilot, instrument, commercial, and flight instructor certifications. Additionally, Ponderosa Aero Club is known for its popular backcountry training course. The club, a 501(c)7 volunteer organization, boasts 175 members and hosts various aviation and social events throughout the year. Operating in Class C airspace, Ponderosa Aero Club provides a unique training environment with interactions with ATC and diverse air traffic. The club is committed to community involvement and aviation education, making it an integral part of the local aviation community. Join us for top-notch training, excellent aircraft, and a friendly, supportive environment.

name: OMNI AVIATION CORPORATION
about: OMNI Aviation Corporation is a premier flight training facility in the Philippines, offering top-notch programs in Pilot Training, Cabin Crew Training, Airline Services Training, and Aircraft Maintenance Training. As the sole International Air Transport Association (IATA) Authorized Training Center in the Philippines, OMNI ensures its training meets the highest international standards. Founded by Captain Ben Hur Gomez, OMNI has expanded from 4 aircraft to a fleet of 21 and operates a private airport within the Clark Freeport Zone. Managed by professional pilots, educators, and industrialists, OMNI is dedicated to developing general aviation in the Philippines and has been recognized as a Top Performing IATA Authorized Training Center in the Asia-Pacific Region. With a robust safety culture and continuous innovation, OMNI Aviation Corporation is the ideal place for aspiring aviation professionals to achieve their dreams.

name: Victoria Flying Club
about: The Victoria Flying Club, located at the Victoria International Airport, has been a cornerstone of aviation training since 1946. With a rich history spanning over 75 years, the club has been dedicated to training world-class professional and recreational pilots. Our fleet consists of standardized Cessna 172S Model aircraft, providing local and international students with top-notch instruction in a varied terrain setting. We offer a range of training programs, including Private Pilot Licence, Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence. The club also specializes in aerial sightseeing tours over Victoria and Vancouver Island, making it a unique and exciting experience for all. Whether you're pursuing a career in aviation or a new hobby, the Victoria Flying Club is committed to providing an unsurpassed level of training and an incredible flying experience. Join us and take to the skies with confidence and passion.

about: Aéro-Club d'Abidjan (ACA) is a non-profit association established in 1947, dedicated to training private pilots at Felix Houphouet Boigny International Airport in Port Bouët, Abidjan. With a friendly and supportive atmosphere, ACA offers comprehensive training approved by the Ivorian Civil Aviation authority. The curriculum includes both theoretical and in-flight instruction provided by experienced instructor pilots, many of whom are professional pilots. ACA has a rich history, having trained thousands of pilots and contributed significantly to aviation activities in Abidjan, including basic flying training, competitions, and navigation. ACA provides a unique opportunity for pilots, engineers, and enthusiasts to come together, exchange ideas, and relax in a comfortable environment. Join ACA to embark on a rewarding journey in aviation.

Upon completing your training, you can obtain a Ukrainian pilot's license, which can be converted into a European certificate through our international partners. Our commitment is to provide a comprehensive and safe learning environment, preparing you for a successful career in aviation. Join us to embark on your journey to becoming a professional pilot.

The school also offers specialized programs, including A320 Type Rating training, and collaborates with various aviation groups to enhance training curriculums and operational efficiency. Redbird Aviation is dedicated to producing highly skilled and dynamic young pilots, ensuring they are well-prepared for a rewarding career in aviation.

Founded by Instructor Suhail, a gold seal instructor with a high passing rate, the school offers customized training programs tailored to each student's needs. With a fleet that includes Cessna 172s equipped with G1000 glass panels, SoCal Aviation ensures a comprehensive and safe flying experience. The school is conveniently located at Chino Airport, offering easy access and favorable year-round weather. SoCal Aviation is recognized as a Distinguished Flight School and is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals with passion and dedication. We strive to make learning to fly enjoyable and rewarding, ensuring our students take to the skies with newfound confidence and skill.

Our team consists of aviation professionals with airline backgrounds, ensuring high standards of education. Located at Poznan International Airport, which is fully controlled and open 24/7, we offer a range of courses from PPL(A) to ATPL(A), including Night VFR, MEP(L), IR(A), CPL(A), and more. Known for delivering training on time and within budget, our graduates have secured jobs with numerous airlines worldwide. With a strong reputation and individualized training approaches, Smart Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation dreams.

Our team includes experienced instructors, many from military and airline backgrounds, and a dedicated office staff. We provide personalized training plans, including non-traditional student programs, and utilize advanced training tools such as FAA-certified Redbird simulators and CommSim training. With a perfect safety record since its founding, Cornerstone Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals in a supportive and professional environment. Join us to realize your dreams of becoming a pilot.

With patient and competent flight instructors, a flexible learning schedule, and time-tested equipment, we ensure a safe and effective start to your aviation career. Join us at ATO Pilotu Mokykla to reach new heights in aviation.

name: Griffith Aviation, Inc.
about: Griffith Aviation, Inc., located at the Griffith-Merrillville Airport in Indiana, is a full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO) and professional flight training school. Established in 1984, the school has a rich history of training pilots, including foreign pilot programs with SAS Airlines and Chinese airlines. Approved for both FAA Part 61 and Part 141 training, Griffith Aviation offers comprehensive flight instruction for all stages of pilot certification, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Pilot licenses. The school is also VA approved and provides specialized training such as Certified Flight Instructor (CFI, CFII, MEI) and Instrument Proficiency Check (IPC). With highly skilled instructors, modern facilities, and two X-SPEC Flight Simulators, Griffith Aviation ensures a high-quality learning environment. The school operates seven days a week, allowing students to fly at their convenience. Griffith Aviation is committed to making your flying dreams a reality.

name: Uzbekistan Airways Aviation Training Center
about: The Uzbekistan Airways Aviation Training Center is the premier institution for pilot training in Uzbekistan. Established to meet the growing demands of the aviation industry, the center offers comprehensive training programs for civil aviation pilots. Previously reliant on foreign flight schools, the center now provides initial training locally, adhering to international standards and Uzbekistan's own rigorous criteria. The training includes theoretical modules in aviation law, aeronautics theory, and aircraft design, followed by practical training using modern simulators and ultra-light training aircraft. The center aims to train at least 25-30 civil pilots annually and has expanded its facilities with new simulators and training aircraft to ensure high-quality education. The training center is committed to producing highly qualified pilots who will join the flight staff of Uzbekistan Airways, ensuring the airline's continued excellence and safety standards.

name: Citywings Flight School
about: Citywings Flight School, located in Schaumburg, Illinois, is Chicago's premier flight training institution. We offer a range of courses, including Sport Pilot and Private Pilot training, as well as Instrument Rating and Commercial Pilot programs. Our introductory flights, or discovery flights, provide a casual and immersive experience for newcomers, allowing them to fly a small airplane under the supervision of a certified instructor. Our comprehensive ground school covers aeronautical knowledge, FAA regulations, and other essential topics. Citywings aims to support the growing aviation sector in the Chicagoland area by training suitably qualified pilots in a friendly and relaxed learning environment. Start your flying journey with us today.

Our team of highly experienced and friendly instructors provides personalized training, including helicopter theory tuition, aircraft endorsements, night ratings, and specialized courses like mustering and sling endorsements. We also offer scenic tours, executive charters, winery tours, and aerial photography services across Southeast Queensland. With a strong commitment to safety and customer service, V2 Helicopters has grown into a leading helicopter company, fostering a deep understanding of aviation and creating competent pilots. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience and discover the freedom of flight with V2 Helicopters.

name: Mountainflyers 80 Ltd.
about: Mountain Flyers 80 Ltd., established in 1980 at Bern Airport and expanded to Grenchen Airport in April 2018, is a premier flight school specializing in helicopter pilot training. Our core business includes a full range of training programs, from trial lessons to commercial and private pilot licenses, as well as instrument flying, night flight training, and type ratings. We boast an extensive fleet featuring the Robinson R22, Robinson R44, Airbus Helicopters H125, Bell 505 Jet Ranger X, and the luxurious Leonardo AW109SP. In addition to aviation training, we offer scenic tours, film flights, and external sling load operations training. Our facilities also host hangar events and team gatherings. With a strong focus on comprehensive training and exceptional service, Mountain Flyers 80 Ltd. is a renowned name in helicopter aviation, committed to excellence in pilot education and aerial services.

name: Civil Aviation Authority of Solomon Islands (CAASI)
about: The Civil Aviation Authority of Solomon Islands (CAASI) is a statutory body dedicated to promoting aviation safety and security. Our primary role is to regulate civil air operations within Solomon Islands and ensure compliance with international standards and recommended practices. We issue licenses for air traffic services, flight crew, and maintenance engineers, and conduct examinations, training, and regulatory tasks as mandated by the Civil Aviation Act 2008 and Civil Aviation Rules. Our mission is to facilitate a safe, secure, and efficient national civil aviation industry, contributing to the country's economic and social development. We prioritize safety above all, ensuring that Solomon Islands' airspace is managed for the progress and well-being of its people. CAASI is committed to providing effective, efficient, and standardized services to meet our legal and corporate obligations.

about: Airways Aviation ESMA, located in Montpellier, France, is Europe's largest multidisciplinary aviation academy, operating since 1988. Approved by the French Civil Aviation Authority, ESMA offers comprehensive training for airline pilots, cabin crew, and aircraft maintenance technicians. The campus, spanning over 7,630 m², includes state-of-the-art facilities such as flight simulators, a cabin crew hall with scale models of various aircraft, and maintenance workshops. Students benefit from a 'students first' approach, with access to sports facilities and a diverse range of activities in the surrounding communities. With a fleet of over 70 modern training aircraft and a commitment to quality education, ESMA provides a rewarding and comprehensive learning experience, ensuring successful career outcomes in the aviation industry.

name: ENEAM (École Nationale de l'Aviation et de la Météorologie)
about: ENEAM (École Nationale de l'Aviation et de la Météorologie), established on September 12, 1975, is a public establishment dedicated to aeronautical and meteorological training in Madagascar. Under the administrative supervision of the Ministry of Civil Aviation, ENEAM offers three primary training cycles: the Professional Pilot Cycle, the Operational Technical Agent Cycle, and the Meteorology Cycle. These programs include theoretical and practical training, with a focus on safety and professional development. ENEAM is committed to improving the quality of its training, supporting the air transport sector, and strengthening national and regional capacities in meteorology. With over 40 years of experience, ENEAM aims to promote excellence in aeronautics and meteorology throughout Madagascar and the Indian Ocean region.

Under the leadership of Ken Davies and other founding pilots, Cascade Aviation has grown into the largest flying club and flight school in northwest Washington. The school offers comprehensive flight and ground training, including FAA-approved private pilot ground school, and a diverse fleet of aircraft for training and rental. With a focus on safety, comfort, and personalized instruction, Cascade Aviation provides resources such as scholarships and discounted club rates to support students in achieving their aviation goals. Join Cascade Aviation to embark on a journey of flight training and lifelong aviation experiences.

The academy is committed to safety, using pure aviation gas and original spare parts, and does not log or pad flight hours. With facilities including its own hangar and housing quarters with Wi-Fi connectivity, DAIAA caters to international students with diverse culinary options. DAIAA is dedicated to producing world-class and globally competitive pilots.

Train with us and experience the unique benefits of flying in Hawaii's favorable year-round weather.

With training centers strategically located in Athens, Greece, and Dubai, UAE, the academy offers a comprehensive training portfolio including the Airline First Officer course (ATPL & A320 type rating), Type Ratings on various aircraft such as A320, A330, A340, B737, EMB145, and more. Additional courses are available for Helicopter Pilots, Aircraft Maintenance Engineers, and Cabin Crew. JETSTREAM supports client airlines in setup, selection, and training, ensuring high-quality and reliable courses for individual pilots and aviation professionals globally. The academy's international profile and expertise make it a trusted name in aviation training.

name: Minot Aero Center
about: The Minot Aero Center, established in 1952 by Alfred Pietsch, is a locally owned and operated business providing comprehensive aviation services. Initially offering crop spraying and flight instruction, the center has expanded to become a full-service fixed base operation (FBO). It is the only Authorized Mooney Service Center in North Dakota and offers aircraft maintenance, flight instruction for various certifications, aircraft rentals, and testing services. With a diverse fleet including Cessna 172s, Piper Warriors, a Piper Seneca, a Mooney, and a Citabria, the center caters to both private and commercial aviation needs. Under the current ownership of Jay and Suzanne Blessum, the Minot Aero Center has seen significant growth, including an increase in female students and the addition of multi-engine instruction. The center is committed to community involvement and provides a supportive environment for all aspiring pilots.

It also offers commercial services such as simulator and training device leasing. The Finnish Aviation Academy is dedicated to providing high-quality training for the next generation of pilots.

The school is recognized for its excellence, having received Cessna’s “Flight Training Excellence” award and maintaining a growing fleet of new generation aircraft. The training is intensive, emphasizing safety and good habits to safeguard equipment. The base also provides sightseeing tours and introductory flights, making it a popular destination for both aspiring pilots and aviation enthusiasts. With a rich history and global recognition, Jack Brown's Seaplane Base continues to be a leader in seaplane education and recreation.

name: Okeechobee County Airport
about: Okeechobee County Airport, located 3 miles northwest of Okeechobee, Florida, is a renowned general aviation airport with a rich history dating back to 1940. Originally known as Conners Field, it was leased by the United States Army Air Corps during World War II for auxiliary training, particularly for B-17 Flying Fortress pilots. After the war, the airport returned to civil use and has since been a hub for general aviation. Our flying school at Okeechobee County Airport offers comprehensive "ab initio" training, specializing in commercial, airline, and private pilot certifications. With a 5,000-foot asphalt runway and excellent facilities, our students benefit from a safe and professional learning environment. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training to ensure each student achieves their aviation goals. Join us at Okeechobee County Airport flying school to embark on your aviation journey with confidence and excellence.

Our services also include aircraft sales, rentals, and a full-service maintenance shop. St. Charles Flying Service is committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals in a friendly, professional environment. Start your flying journey with us today.

name: SA Red Cross Air Mercy Service Trust
about: The SA Red Cross Air Mercy Service Trust (AMS), established in 1966, is a non-profit aero-medical rescue organisation. Originally founded by the South African Red Cross Society, it became an independent trust in 1994. AMS provides comprehensive air ambulance, health outreach, and rescue services using a mix of fixed-wing and rotor-wing aircraft, as well as ground vehicles. With bases in the Western Cape, KwaZulu-Natal, and Eastern Cape, and supportive infrastructure in other provinces, AMS ensures 24/7 access to healthcare for critically ill or injured persons, especially in remote rural communities. The service is licensed by the South African Civil Aviation Authority and operates under rigorous training and safety standards, committed to saving lives and improving the quality of life for vulnerable communities. AMS works closely with Provincial Departments of Health and other stakeholders to deliver equitable healthcare access.

name: Link Aviation
about: Link Aviation, founded by Edwin A. Link in the 1930s, is a pioneering institution in flight training. Link developed the revolutionary "Link Trainer," also known as the "Blue Box," a flight simulator that taught pilots to fly by instruments, significantly enhancing safety and training efficiency. During World War II, Link trainers were instrumental in training over 500,000 military pilots worldwide. The simulators, using organ bellows and electric pumps to mimic flight movements, were adopted by the U.S. Army Air Corps, Navy, and other nations. Link Aviation's innovative approach to flight training has saved countless lives and set the standard for modern flight simulators, continuing to influence aviation education to this day. Our legacy is built on innovation, safety, and the commitment to excellence in pilot training.

Founded to help military pilots transition to commercial aviation, ATP JETS now offers comprehensive training programs, including the FAA-approved Airline Transport Pilot Certification Training Program (ATP CTP) and Airbus A320 type rating courses. With state-of-the-art facilities, including 14 Flight Simulation Training Devices and 16 full-motion simulators, ATP JETS trains nearly 500 pilots per month. The school has partnered with 57 air carriers and has graduated over 20,000 ATP CTP students, making it a pivotal institution in preparing pilots for the airline industry. ATP JETS offers full financing options, GI Bill eligibility, and supportive services like visa assistance and accommodation, ensuring a seamless training experience.
services: ["Airline Transport Pilot ATP"]

name: COPTERING, S.L
about: At COPTERING, S.L, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive and professional helicopter pilot training. Our courses are designed to meet the needs of aspiring pilots, from the Private Helicopter Pilot Certification (PPL-H) to the highest ratings for multi-engine helicopters with instrument flight privileges. With a daily dedication of approximately 13 to 20 months, our programs ensure students gain the necessary skills and qualifications to operate single-engine and multi-engine helicopters safely and efficiently. We offer progressive qualification paths, allowing students to act as professionals in the aviation industry. Our commitment to quality training and safety ensures that our graduates are well-prepared for a successful career in helicopter aviation. Join us at COPTERING to embark on your aviation journey with confidence and excellence.

We provide comprehensive instruction for sport pilot and ultralight airmen, ensuring a thorough and enjoyable learning environment. Our facility is based at the Illinois Valley Airport, where students can take advantage of our expert instructors and state-of-the-art training equipment. We also offer comfortable housing options for our students, making your training experience seamless and stress-free. Whether you're looking for a unique aerial vacation or a serious flight training program, Captain Drake's Family Aerial Adventures is the perfect destination for your aviation aspirations. Join us for an unforgettable adventure in the skies.

We cater to both US and non-US citizens, with TSA approval for international students. Our experienced instructors tailor training to individual needs and schedules, ensuring a cost-effective and goal-oriented learning experience. Whether you aspire to fly recreationally or pursue a career with an airline, Safety In Motion Flight Center is committed to helping you achieve your aviation dreams.

name: Aviomar Flight Academy
about: Aviomar Flight Academy, established in 1982, is a leading international flight school based in Rome, Italy. Managed by former Alitalia Captain Riccardo Marano, the academy boasts a team of experienced instructors, including airline and military pilots, ensuring the highest industry standards. Aviomar offers a wide range of courses, including Private Pilot (PPL), Airline Transport Pilot (ATPL) integrated and modular, instrument ratings, and type ratings for various aircraft such as the Boeing 737 and Airbus A320. The academy is certified by ENAC on behalf of EASA and features advanced flight simulators and a large training fleet. Aviomar is also a Ryanair Training Partner, providing a mentored programme for aspiring airline pilots. With a commitment to safety and professional excellence, Aviomar has been training pilots for over 40 years, offering an honor loan scheme and a supportive learning environment. Aviomar is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals.

name: National Test Pilot School
about: The National Test Pilot School (NTPS) is the only civilian test-pilot school in the United States, located in Mojave, California. Established in 1981, NTPS is a not-for-profit educational institute recognized by the international Society of Experimental Test Pilots. It offers Master of Science degrees in Flight Test Engineering and Flight Test and Evaluation, accredited by the Engineering Accreditation Commission of ABET. NTPS provides comprehensive flight test education and training, utilizing modern facilities, specialized laboratories, simulators, and a diverse fleet of instrumented aircraft. The school's experienced instructors, averaging over 15 years of flight test experience, ensure students gain the skills to safely and effectively plan, execute, and report on flight test programs. NTPS is committed to enhancing flight test competency, safety, and the aerospace profession worldwide.

Our services also include seaplane tours, charters, and sightseeing trips, ensuring a memorable experience for all our clients.

Our active flight school provides a structured learning environment, including ground school and flight training for the Private Pilot license. Students can enroll in a 10-week ground school course to prepare for the FAA Aeronautical Knowledge Test. Our instructors are experienced and dedicated, guiding students through the requirements for licensing, which include at least 40 hours of flight time and passing both knowledge and practical tests. The airport also hosts an active Pilot's Association, organizing events like the annual Breakfast Fly-In and Summer Ice Cream Social Concert. With a courtesy car available for pilots and passengers, we ensure a welcoming and supportive experience for all. Our goal is to help you achieve your aviation dreams with professional and friendly service.

["Ground School

name: FLY Goodyear Flight Training
about: FLY Goodyear Flight Training, formerly known as Buckeye Flight Experience, has been training pilots in the Phoenix Valley for over 15 years. Since moving to the Goodyear Airport in 2013, we have provided a quality and personalized learning environment. We offer single-engine and multi-engine flight training for both recreational and career-oriented pilots, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our fleet includes Cessna 172s and Piper Seneca I and II aircraft. We emphasize flexible, one-on-one instruction and online ground school to accommodate various schedules. With competitive rates and financing options available, we ensure that flight training is both rewarding and fun. Our experienced instructors are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us to start your flight training journey today.

name: Eastern Soaring Center
about: Eastern Soaring Center, located near Washington, D.C., and Baltimore, is a premier destination for glider flight instruction and scenic rides. Owned and operated by Brian Collins, a retired USAF colonel and highly experienced glider pilot with over 4,000 hours and 10,000 flights, the center offers expert training and thrilling experiences. Collins, an SSA Instructor and Glider Check Pilot Examiner, has set numerous state and national records. The center utilizes a unique winch launching system, allowing for efficient and safe flights without the need for a tow plane. With its ideal location, Eastern Soaring Center benefits from excellent thermals and mountain waves, making it one of the best spots on the East Coast for soaring. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, Eastern Soaring Center provides a peaceful and exhilarating flying experience.
services: ["Glider"]

name: Art Williams & Harry Wendt Aeronautical Engineering School
about: The Art Williams & Harry Wendt Aeronautical Engineering School is a premier institution in the Caribbean dedicated to training aircraft maintenance engineers. Approved and certified by the Guyana Civil Aviation Authority, Trinidad & Tobago Civil Aviation Authority, Civil Aviation Safety Authority Suriname, and Jamaica Civil Aviation Authority, the school offers a comprehensive ab-initio training program. This program, spanning three and a quarter years, includes theoretical, skills, and practical training, preparing students for the Aircraft Maintenance Engineer’s Licence. The school is ISO 9001 certified and a member of the Flight Safety Foundation and International Federation of Airworthiness. It recently received approval for a BSc in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering, enhancing career opportunities for its graduates. The school's mission is to develop highly trained aircraft maintenance engineers, ensuring safety and excellence in air transport within Guyana and globally.

Our fleet of five aircraft is available for rental, and we provide flexible payment options to accommodate various budgets. With a focus on professionalism and affordability, Beach Banners is the go-to choice for aviation needs in the Southeast. Whether you're aspiring to become a pilot or need effective aerial advertising, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your goals.

Our training philosophy is built on careful design and a focus on safety, ensuring that every student's path to flight is both enjoyable and successful. We offer training for Private, Instrument, Commercial, and Certified Flight Instructor (CFI) ratings, utilizing the Cessna 172 Skyhawk, an IFR-capable aircraft. Our custom training syllabi, developed from decades of educational and aviation experience, guide students through four stages of training: Basic Flight Procedures, Navigation and Instrument Flight, Cross-Country Flight, and Check-Ride Preparation. Our instructors, including former college professors, are dedicated to developing safe and competent aviators. Join us for a Discovery Flight and become part of a dedicated aviation community where safety and excellence are paramount.

WVFC is member-driven, with a board of directors elected by the membership, ensuring diversity and open thinking. With a commitment to excellence and safety, West Valley Flying Club has helped over 13,000 members achieve their flying dreams.

about: Blue Skies Flight School, located at the Edmond / Guthrie airport in Oklahoma, offers comprehensive flight training from introductory levels to advanced certifications. about: FlySky Morocco Aeroclub is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. Located in Morocco, our school offers comprehensive training programs for aspiring private pilots, combining theoretical and practical instruction. Our curriculum includes 140 hours of theoretical courses, structured into 9 regulatory modules, and 39 hours of practical flight training, which includes instruction, solo flights, and navigation exercises. With qualified instructors and modern aircraft equipped with full glass cockpits, we ensure a seamless learning experience. Our programs are designed to be flexible, with options for evening, weekend, and weekday classes, and we offer financing options to make training accessible. At FlySky Morocco, we aim to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to obtain their Private Pilot License (PPL) within four months, ensuring they are well-prepared for a safe and successful flying career.

Our fully qualified personnel are experts in maintaining a wide range of aircraft, including the full family of Airbus Helicopters, Robinson Helicopters, and other types. We offer comprehensive maintenance services such as light maintenance, troubleshooting, periodical inspections, post-incident inspections, external aircraft painting, and interior refurbishment. Our capabilities also include avionics repairs, system upgrades, sheet metal repair, and composite part manufacturing. We specialize in inspections for various helicopter models, including the AS350/H125, AS355, and Bell Helicopters. With access to all necessary parts, we ensure your fleet remains airborne. Ultimax Aviation is dedicated to delivering reliable results and facilitating aviation business in Africa.

name: Chesapeake Sport Pilot
about: Chesapeake Sport Pilot, located on the Eastern Shore of Maryland at Bay Bridge Airport, is a national leader in sport and private pilot training. Founded in 2006 and owned by Helen Woods since 2016, the school offers flight training, aircraft rentals, and maintenance services. Our fleet includes six modern, well-maintained airplanes: two Van’s RV–12s, two Tecnam P92 Eaglets, and two Cessna 172 Superhawks. Our instructors, many of whom are retired military or airline pilots, are passionate about teaching and fostering a strong community of pilots. We cater to those seeking fun in flying, whether starting later in life or returning to the skies. Recognized annually in AOPA’s Flight Training Experience Awards, Chesapeake Sport Pilot is a place where pilots come to learn, enjoy flying, and be part of a vibrant aviation community. Here, you'll find a welcoming environment that makes flying an enjoyable and rewarding experience.

Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors provide a supportive and professional environment for aspiring pilots. With a focus on practical and theoretical training, BAC prepares students for successful careers in aviation. Contact us at Stratusvej 15, Billund, to embark on your pilot training journey. At BAC, we are committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals.

name: ADF Airways Academy
about: ADF Airways Flight Academy, located at Miami Executive Airport in Miami, Florida, is a premier FAA-approved Part 141 flight school with over 30 years of experience. We offer a full range of ratings from Private Pilot to Airline Transport Pilot, including Instrument Rating, Commercial Single and Multi-Engine Certificates, and a specialized Jet Transition course. Our academy is approved by the Department of Veterans Affairs and provides assistance for foreign students to gain FAA ratings and student visas. With a wide range of single and multi-engine aircraft and advanced flight simulators, including a Boeing 737 simulator, we ensure high-quality training. Our experienced and professional instructors are dedicated to safety and excellence, having graduated over 7,000 pilots worldwide. We pride ourselves on our strong safety record and a family-oriented work philosophy, making ADF Airways an ideal choice for those seeking to embark on a successful aviation career.

The college provides comprehensive courses, including Mountain & Strip Flying, tail-wheel experience, and Instrument Rating. Many graduates have secured jobs with major airlines such as Air New Zealand, Air India, and IndiGO. Mainland Aviation College is committed to producing talented pilots, helping meet the global demand for skilled aviators. Start your aviation career with us and gain the skills and experience needed to succeed in the industry.

As an FAA Designated Computer Testing Center, we administer FAA knowledge tests and offer structured academic environments to ensure students achieve their aviation goals efficiently. Whether you aim to fly for personal pleasure or pursue a career in aviation, DCT Aviation has the expertise and equipment to make your flying dreams come true. Contact us to start your journey today.

about: Northern Light Academy of Aviation and Technology (NAAT) is a leading aviation academy in Nepal, affiliated with City and Guilds, UK, and IATA. Located in Kathmandu, NAAT offers diploma courses in Aviation and Travel Tourism, as well as EASA Part 66 Modular training in collaboration with Air Service Training (AST). The academy provides industry-recognized courses, including Airline Cabin Crew Training, Ground Operations Management, and Passenger Ground Services. NAAT is distinguished by its paid internships at Tribhuwan International Airport and high placement records in national and international airports and airlines. With City & Guilds and IATA-approved instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, NAAT ensures quality education and career opportunities in aviation, including pilot training in Canada and Aircraft Maintenance Engineering. NAAT is committed to advancing knowledge and fostering individual aviation careers.

name: Middle Georgia State University
about: Middle Georgia State University's School of Aviation is Georgia's only public, 4-year aviation program, offering a range of degrees and certificates in aviation science and management. The school provides training under Part 141 and 61, with a fleet of 30 airplanes, 4 helicopters, and advanced simulators. Students can pursue tracks in Professional Flight (airplane and helicopter), Management, and various certificate programs like Aviation Maintenance Technology and Air Traffic Management. The faculty includes experienced professionals from the airline, military, and government sectors. The school is part of the Delta Propel program, offering a direct career path to Delta Air Lines. Graduates are well-prepared for immediate employment in the aviation industry, with a strong job placement rate. The school maintains professional affiliations with major airlines and aerospace firms, ensuring students receive comprehensive and industry-relevant education.

The school offers training for Private Pilot Licenses, Night Ratings, and Commercial Pilot Licenses with Instrument Ratings. With a diverse student body including international students from various countries, MFS has produced professional pilots now serving in airlines and general aviation globally. The school operates from its main office in Pasay City and its hangar at Plaridel Airport, Bulacan, ensuring high-quality training and adherence to CAAP policies. MFS is committed to rearing students to the highest standards, making them valuable assets to society.

Our team is passionate about aviation, and we honor the memory of our young instructor, Kylie Murray, through the Kylie's Memorial Scholarship. As a Part 141 school, Crystal Aero Group adheres to rigorous FAA standards, allowing students to earn certifications with fewer overall hours. With a long-standing service lease at the county-owned Crystal River Airport since 1983, Crystal Aero Group is committed to serving pilots and students worldwide while supporting local businesses and residents as a vibrant transportation hub. Owned and operated by experienced aviation professionals, the school ensures a safe, comprehensive, and enriching learning experience for all students.

FTEJerez boasts a purpose-built campus, a low student-to-instructor ratio, and a fleet of advanced training aircraft and simulators. The academy is committed to providing high-quality training, personalized attention, and strong airline connections to ensure graduates secure their first job as a First Officer. With a team of experienced instructors and a supportive environment, FTEJerez is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots realize their dreams.

Developed by industry leaders, including a former FAA and CAA examiner, our training system is structured into online, ground, and flight segments. Our comprehensive approach covers all technical subject areas, lesson plan creation, and complex regulations, ensuring students' fundamental knowledge, teaching methods, and flight proficiency exceed industry standards. With a strong track record of success, CFI Bootcamp is committed to guiding students to achieve their CFI certification efficiently and effectively.

about: Phuket Flying Club, located at Phuket Airpark in Thailand, offers a unique opportunity to learn to fly in a tropical paradise. Our flight school specializes in training students for the Thailand Ultralight Pilot’s License (UPL). The comprehensive training course includes 18 hours of flight training, 3 hours of solo flying, ground school tuition, a written exam, and a practical test with a CAAT examiner. Students must also obtain a Class 4 Medical and complete a background check. With flexible training schedules, students can complete the course in as little as 2 to 3 weeks. Our qualified instructors and modern fleet of aircraft ensure a safe and effective learning environment. The minimum training cost is 117,000 Baht, excluding exam and medical fees. The club also hosts a gliding club and a group for amateur aircraft builders. With four club aircraft and around 15 private aircraft on site, APCK provides a comprehensive flying environment. The airfield, under military supervision, is a protected European natural reserve, ensuring a harmonious balance between nature and aviation. APCK welcomes members and visitors alike, offering a welcoming space to enjoy flying and the surrounding natural beauty. Whether you are a seasoned pilot or just starting your aviation journey, APCK is an ideal place to pursue your flying dreams.

name: ANAC TOGO
about: The Agence Nationale de l'Aviation Civile du Togo (ANAC-TOGO) is the civil aviation authority of Togo, operating under the Minister of Civil Aviation. Established by law n°2007-007 of 22 January 2007, ANAC-TOGO is responsible for implementing the state's civil aviation policy, negotiating international agreements, and developing technical regulations in line with ICAO standards. The agency oversees all aeronautical and airport activities, ensures compliance with national and international safety and security regulations, and manages traffic rights from air agreements. ANAC-TOGO also conducts audits, inspections, and staff training to maintain high safety standards and supports the implementation of the National Aviation Safety Program. With a strong commitment to international cooperation and aviation safety, ANAC-TOGO plays a pivotal role in regulating and supervising civil aviation in Togo, ensuring a safe and efficient aviation industry.

about: Helico Sonoma, established in 2014, is a comprehensive helicopter training facility and touring operation based at Sonoma County Charles Schulz Airport in Santa Rosa, California. Our Chief Pilot and CEO, Dan King, leads a team with over 13 years of combined flight experience. We offer structured training programs in Robinson R44 and R22 helicopters, focusing on safety and professionalism. Our services extend to helicopter maintenance, firefighting, law enforcement support, and various aerial services. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we provide professional and courteous instruction for those seeking helicopter licenses or certifications. Our scenic tours cover the North Bay and Northern California, offering a unique flying experience. Contact us to embark on your aviation journey with confidence and fun.

name: Flight Training College George CC
about: Flight Training College (FTC) in George, South Africa, offers a comprehensive range of pilot training programs, from the basic Private Pilot Licence (PPL) to the advanced Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) and Airline Transport Pilot Licence (ATP). Our primary focus is on Professional Pilot Training, while also enhancing knowledge, skill, and safety standards in the recreational and private flying sectors. Located at George Airport, one of the most ideal locations in the Cape flying region and equipped to international standards, FTC is committed to delivering the best training possible. We prepare our graduates for careers in the aviation industry, whether they aim to fly privately or commercially. Our courses include Instrument Rating, Multi Engine, and Instructor Rating, ensuring our students are well-prepared for their aviation careers. With a strong emphasis on career guidance and support, FTC is the ideal place to start your aviation journey.

about: Aeolus Flight Academy, located in the heart of Ontario, Canada, offers a comprehensive and immersive flight training experience. With a successful track record of training over 500 pilots, the academy boasts modern aircraft and highly qualified instructors. The curriculum includes ground school instruction and practical flight training, emphasizing safety and personalized instruction. Each student is paired with a dedicated instructor to customize their training program. The academy features advanced flight simulators and a diverse range of well-maintained aircraft, from single-engine trainers to multi-engine aircraft. Aeolus Flight Academy is committed to providing a superior flight training experience, equipping students with the necessary skills and knowledge to launch a successful career in aviation.

name: Fly Provence
about: Fly Provence is a premier flying school based in Aix-en-Provence, dedicated to providing comprehensive and engaging flight training programs. With a passion for teaching, flying, and discovering the beautiful region, our school offers a range of activities including introductory flights, flying courses for all levels, and professional pilot licenses. Our experienced instructors, with over 20 years of expertise, ensure students receive the best possible support and training. We utilize state-of-the-art flight simulators and operate from Aix les Milles and Castellet international airports. At Fly Provence, we combine pleasure, discovery, and rigorous training to prepare our students for successful careers in aviation. Our commitment to safety, innovation, and personalized training makes us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Join us to embark on a journey that combines the joy of flying with professional excellence.

name: Skies Aviation Academy
about: Skies Aviation Academy, based at Thessaloniki International Airport in Greece, is the first EASA-certified academy in the country, offering integrated ATPL, Modular, FI, and Type rating training. Our team of experienced instructors, with thousands of hours as airline and private jet pilots, provides professional training in a friendly and professional environment. We operate a modern fleet of Diamonds and Pipers, along with a state-of-the-art ALSIM ALX FNPTII simulator. With VFR weather conditions available 340 days a year, our students can progress continuously. Our facilities in Peraia include fully equipped classrooms and a student rest area, ensuring an ideal learning environment. We aim to be the leader in European aviation training, preparing students for successful careers in the airline industry through high-quality training and partnerships with airlines. Our goal is to make our students' dream of becoming pilots a reality.

about: Hampton Airfield, Inc. is a vibrant aviation community established in 1946 as a training center for World War II veterans. Located in Hampton, New Hampshire, between Boston and Portsmouth, the airfield offers a rich seacoast atmosphere and a variety of aviation services. Our flight school, led by certified and experienced instructors, provides comprehensive training for Sport Pilot and Private Pilot licenses, including introductory flights, ground school, and flight reviews. With a strong focus on community and safety, Hampton Airfield features a turf and asphalt runway, aircraft rentals, maintenance services, and an award-winning cafe. We are dedicated to fostering a welcoming and supportive environment for students of all ages, making learning to fly both fun and rewarding. Join our family of aviation enthusiasts and let your dreams take flight.

name: Fly Cape Town Paragliding
about: Fly Cape Town Paragliding is a team of highly experienced Tandem Paragliding Flight Instructors licensed by the South African Hang gliding and Paragliding Association (SAHPA). With a passion for paragliding since 2006, our owner Stephan leads a team that includes instructors like Fanie, Martin, and Petar, each with extensive flying experience. We operate from popular sites such as Signal Hill and Lions Head within the Table Mountain National Park, ensuring safe and exhilarating flights for all ages and skill levels. Our training courses are structured to teach you how to become a safe and competent paragliding pilot, with a minimum of 35 flights and comprehensive theory classes. We prioritize safety and fun, making paragliding accessible to everyone, including children as young as 14 and adults up to 87 years old. Join us for an unforgettable paragliding experience in the beauty of Cape Town.

name: AAG INTERNATIONAL CENTER FOR AVIATION TRAINING CORP
about: AAG International Center for Aviation Training (AICAT) is a subsidiary of Alpha Aviation Group, specializing in premier pilot training solutions in the Philippines. Headquartered in San Fernando, La Union, AICAT offers integrated training programs including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrumental Rating, and Flight Instructor certifications. With a fleet of over 30 Cessna 172s and a Tecnam P2006T, AICAT provides world-class flight training across five training hubs. Certified by CAAP and ISO, AICAT adopts the Competency Based Training and Assessment (CBTA) philosophy, ensuring trainees develop necessary pilot competencies. AICAT also features advanced simulator training, including the Alsim AL172 MKII FNPT II, to simulate real-world flight conditions. Our mission is to train and develop world-class pilots and future leaders for the aviation industry, providing a comprehensive and innovative learning experience.

name: Moorabbin Flying Services
about: Moorabbin Flying Services (MFS) is a government-accredited flight training provider based in Melbourne, Australia. With over 25 years of experience, MFS offers a comprehensive range of pilot training courses from ab-initio to the Air Transport Pilot Licence (ATPL), including Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and Multi-Crew Cooperation (MCC) courses. MFS is renowned for its high-quality training, utilizing Australia’s newest fleet of single and multi-engined Piper training aircraft, with an average age of under three years. The school has been awarded the Flying Training Organisation of the Year by the Australian Division of the Royal Aeronautical Society and Australian Flying magazine in 2017 and 2018. MFS is committed to inspiring new pilots to achieve their goals, providing structured courses and flexible training options to suit every aspiring and professional pilot.

name: Williams Soaring Center
about: Williams Soaring Center, located in Williams, CA, north of Sacramento, is the premier Northern California glider training and soaring site. With over 30 years in the aviation business, the center offers FAA-certified flight training for all levels, from basic primary and transition glider pilot training to advanced cross-country, aerobatic, and self-launch motor glider training. The facility includes a private airport, a clubhouse with a pilot lounge and full kitchen, training and briefing rooms, and a full-service FAA certified repair shop. Williams Soaring Center is home to the Valley Soaring Association and supports the Soaring Society of America's principles, emphasizing safety through professional training. The center provides a welcoming environment for both new and experienced pilots, with favorable soaring conditions year-round. Join us to experience the joy of pure flight in a safe and professional setting.

name: Royal Queensland Aero Club
about: The Royal Queensland Aero Club (RQAC), founded in 1910, is the oldest flying club in the Southern Hemisphere. Originally known as the Australian Aero Club – Queensland Section, it was renamed the Queensland Aero Club in 1920 and granted a Royal Charter in 1935. Based at Archerfield Airport, RQAC offers flight training from the first lesson to Frozen ATPL, along with various certificate, diploma, and advanced diploma programs. The club has a rich heritage, having trained pilots for Qantas, the Royal Australian Air Force, and other prominent aviation entities. RQAC is a community-driven organisation that preserves aviation legacy and supports aviation enthusiasts through social events, flying competitions, and partnerships. Membership is open to all with an interest in aviation, and the club continues to provide high-standard training with an emphasis on continuous improvement. Join RQAC to be part of a century-long tradition in aviation excellence.

about: The Harvard Club of South Africa, established in 1990, is dedicated to preserving the aviation heritage of the North American Harvard aircraft. Launched during the 50th anniversary celebrations of the Harvard, the club aims to recruit members involved with the aircraft since 1940, particularly those associated with the South African Air Force Association (SAAFA). Based at AFB SWKP, the club maintains and flies a fleet of Harvards, now certified as National Heritage items. Through various air shows, fly-ins, and fundraising activities like sky typing, the club ensures these historic aircraft remain in South Africa for future generations. The club's efforts are supported by enthusiasts, including the younger generation, who work tirelessly to preserve this aviation legacy. The Harvard Club of South Africa continues to thrive, celebrating and protecting the history of these iconic aircraft.

The club provides aircraft maintenance, fuel services, and rental options, and it organizes annual fly-in flights to promote general aviation across the Kingdom. The SAC is dedicated to fostering talents in aviation and contributing to the advancement of aviation culture and sciences in Saudi Arabia.

As a not-for-profit organization, it includes the East Hill Aviation Foundation and Aviation Explorer Post 62. The club offers FAA Part 141 flight training with ten certified instructors and nine aircraft, including Cessna 152 and 172 models, equipped with the latest technology such as Garmin ADS-B transponders. Members can enjoy fly-outs, scenic flights over Ithaca and the Finger Lakes, and various community activities. The club provides a Discovery Flight introduction to flying and accommodates schedules with seven-day training. East Hill Flying Club has been teaching flying in Ithaca for over 60 years, making flying accessible and enjoyable for its members.

We are the exclusive flight training partner for the Gallatin College-MSU Aviation Degree Program and boast a modern fleet of Diamond and Cessna aircraft, known for their safety and fuel efficiency. name: JetWright
baseAirport: PRC -Prescott Regional - Ernest A Love Field
about: At JetWright, we specialize in providing accelerated and personalized jet flight training programs, tailored to meet the unique needs of each pilot. Our courses are designed for those seeking a Citation CJ Series type rating, whether it's a Single Pilot CE-525S or a Crew Type Rating CE-525. Our training includes an advanced self-study package followed by one-on-one flight and ground instruction, conducted by FAA Designated Pilot Examiners. The 12-day full immersion program is split into two 5-day periods, separated by 2 days of self-study, ensuring comprehensive preparation for the practical examination. With flexible scheduling and the option to train at our Arizona locations or at your own site, we offer the best possible training environment. Our dedicated instructors ensure you receive the highest quality education, preparing you to excel in jet operations. At JetWright, we commit to your success in achieving your jet type rating.

name: Praxis Aerospace Concepts International
about: Praxis Aerospace Concepts International (PACI) is a service-disabled, veteran-owned small business based in Southern Nevada. Founded in 2011, PACI specializes in developing practical solutions for multi-modal robotics and unmanned systems (UxS) using proprietary technology, unique domain expertise, and strategic partnerships. As a leader in the UAS industry, PACI operates field facilities for autonomous systems research, development, testing, and training. It is the only Southern Nevada industry partner of the FAA's Center of Excellence for Unmanned Aircraft Systems (COE UAS) and holds multiple FAA approvals for extended visual line of sight, night flights, and beyond visual line of sight operations. PACI provides comprehensive training, consulting, and technical services, supporting clients globally in military, public, and civil sectors. With a strong commitment to innovation and safety, PACI continues to drive advancements in UAS integration into national airspace.

Both programs benefit from state-of-the-art facilities at Springbank Airport, airline partnerships, and advanced technology, ensuring graduates are highly sought after in the aviation industry. With a focus on academic excellence, professional conduct, and industry connections, Mount Royal University's flying school is a leading choice for aspiring aviation professionals.

UCM's aviation program is a gateway to an exciting and rewarding career in the aviation industry.

As one of only three FAA and Department of Education recognized schools in Puerto Rico, it offers a comprehensive range of training programs for airplane and helicopter pilots. The school boasts a diverse fleet including basic single-engine trainers, advanced "glass cockpit" aircraft, complex aircraft, twin-engine airplanes, tail draggers, and helicopters. As the first International Cessna Pilot Center, Isla Grande Flying School is committed to providing high-quality training with highly qualified and experienced instructors. With nearly seven decades of service, the school remains a one-stop shop for all aviation needs in Puerto Rico, dedicated to helping students achieve their dream of flight.

Known for its outstanding instructors and excellent staff, the center has earned a reputation for delivering safe and effective training, making it a preferred choice for pilots from various nationalities. EPA Training Center is committed to excellence and customer satisfaction, ensuring a comfortable and supportive learning environment for all its students.

Call us at 916-794-1359 to get started on your flight training journey.

The academy's mission is to present a well-planned program in a structured yet friendly environment, providing the highest quality and safest flight training possible. Florida Aviation Academy is trusted by airlines worldwide for producing accomplished and safe pilots.

about: FAS Pilot Academy, one of the oldest EASA Approved Training Organizations (ATO) in Greece, boasts over 15 years of expertise in pilot training. With multiple locations in Greece, including Rhodes, Megara, and Markopoulo, the academy leverages the country's ideal flying weather, with approximately 320 days of perfect conditions annually. FAS Pilot Academy offers comprehensive training programs for Commercial and Air Transport Pilot Licenses, as well as Airbus A320 Type Rating. The academy is committed to flight safety, holding approvals for maintenance and continuing airworthiness management. It also serves as an ICAO / TOEFA © Examination Centre. With a state-of-the-art aircraft fleet and experienced instructors, FAS Pilot Academy ensures professional and efficient training, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. Choose FAS Pilot Academy for a legacy of excellence and superior training facilities.

With over 60 years of experience, Southern Seaplane is committed to safety and excellence in seaplane aviation. Our goal is to provide unparalleled training and service, making your flying experience both safe and memorable.

Facilities include a restaurant, maintenance shop, and full-service fueling, ensuring a supportive and well-equipped learning environment. Brampton Flight Centre is dedicated to safety, security, and excellence in aviation education, making it a premier choice for aspiring pilots.

name: Wright Aviation
baseAirport: COS -City of Colorado Springs Municipal Airport
about: Wright Aviation Flying School, established by the pioneering Wright brothers, is a historic institution in aviation training. From 1910 to 1916, the school operated at several locations, including Montgomery, Alabama, Huffman Prairie Flying Field near Dayton, Ohio, and Augusta, Georgia. The Wrights trained over 100 pilots, including early military aviators like Henry H. Arnold and Thomas DeWitt Milling. The curriculum included ground school, simulator training, and actual flight instruction on Wright aircraft with dual controls. Students learned to manipulate the engine, judge wind currents, and control the aircraft's ascent and descent. The school's rigorous training prepared students for licensing tests and real-world flying. With a legacy of innovation and excellence, Wright Aviation Flying School remains a cornerstone in the history of aviation education.

Our members fly a variety of aircraft, including microlights (Aquillas) and light aircraft (Slings, Foxbats, RV’s, Cubs, and similar). Situated within King Shaka airspace, we operate under a unique agreement requiring transponder equipment and adherence to specific corridors for safe routing. The club features four grass runways and a welcoming clubhouse with excellent facilities for both visiting pilots and members. We emphasize safety and compliance, with daily operations requiring communication with King Shaka Air Traffic Control and adherence to Durban Special Rules frequency. Our friendly atmosphere and scenic flights make us an ideal choice for aviation enthusiasts. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience.

MAF pilots and maintenance personnel, often with dual roles, fly to 13 airstrips, delivering aid, conducting medical evacuations, and transporting personnel and supplies. about: Frost Aviation Services, Inc. is a Part 61 Flight School located at Las Cruces International Airport in New Mexico. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our fleet includes Piper Archers, Arrows, and Aztecs, ensuring students have access to well-maintained and diverse aircraft. Led by Gold Seal Flight Instructor Chris Frost, our team is dedicated to stretching students' training dollars and helping them achieve their aviation goals. We provide 24/7 self-serve AVGAS 100LL, convenient facilities, and a supportive learning environment. Frost Aviation is a member of the NM Pilot Association, EAA, and AOPA, and we are committed to preparing students for career or pleasure flying with excellent instructors and affordable rates. Join us to start your aviation journey today.

about: FlightSafety International is the world's premier professional aviation training company, providing elite training programs for business, corporate, private, and commercial pilots. With facilities in 40 locations globally, including the United States, Australia, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Japan, South Africa, the Netherlands, and the United Kingdom, we offer training on a wide variety of aircraft. Our programs include mission-critical training for military and government organizations, as well as technical support and advanced full flight simulators. We train over a million hours annually for pilots, technicians, and aviation professionals from 167 countries. At FlightSafety International, we empower aviation professionals with the skills and composure needed for all situations, ensuring they stay sharp and always prepared.

We offer comprehensive training programs for private, instrument, commercial, and flight instructor certifications. Our experienced instructors create a fun and relaxed learning environment, whether you're flying for recreation or a career. As a flying club, we also offer aircraft rentals at competitive rates. With a history of training numerous students who have become major airline pilots, Royal Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us at (714) 557-7174 to start your flight training journey.

name: GA System Aircraft Maintenance
about: GA System Aircraft Maintenance is a premier aviation training institution, dedicated to preparing students for careers in aircraft maintenance. Our programs are FAA 14 CFR Part 147 certified, ensuring students receive the highest standard of education. Located on the Thomson Campus of Augusta Technical College, our facility spans 16,000 square feet, including classrooms and labs equipped with all necessary tools and four complete aircraft for hands-on training. Our curriculum combines theory and practical application, preparing graduates to inspect, troubleshoot, and maintain all types of certificated aircraft. With a strong focus on industry needs, we provide students with the skills and knowledge required to succeed in this growing field, where job growth is predicted to be around 4% between 2022-2032. Our graduates are well-prepared to enter the workforce, contributing to the aviation industry's continued growth and excellence.

name: INBOUND AVIATION PTY LTD
about: Inbound Aviation Pty Ltd, established in Victoria in 2012, is dedicated to preparing the next generation of pilots for Australian airline flying. With training facilities and an aircraft fleet in Mangalore and Melbourne, the school offers professional and personal support through highly experienced instructors. Managing Director Tom Gollan, with twenty years in aviation, ensures the training meets the highest standards, including a 12-month cadetship contract with regional airline partners like FlyPelican and Sharp Airlines. The team, including Operations Manager Anna Hammond and Safety Manager James Costa, fosters a supportive environment, emphasizing student wellbeing and safety. As a Registered Training Organisation, Inbound Aviation provides nationally recognised qualifications and industry-endorsed training programs, making it an ideal place for aspiring pilots to achieve their career goals.

Our team of experienced instructors, with thousands of hours of pilot training experience, provides top-notch instruction in a fun and family-oriented atmosphere. With 350 days of good flying weather annually, our facility at Scottsdale Airport ensures efficient and cost-effective training. We are part of the Cessna Pilot Center network, guaranteeing the highest standards in aviation training. Our Aviator Career Program takes students from beginners to experienced pilots in just 18 months, with a 91% first-time pass rate. Sierra Charlie Aviation is committed to turning aspiring pilots into skilled aviators, making it the best choice for your aviation journey.

Our experienced and friendly FAA Certified Flight Instructors ensure an unmatched learning experience in our well-maintained fleet of Cessnas and helicopters. We also offer an accredited degree program in Aeronautics through Northwest College. Our facilities in Cody, WY, and Hamilton, MT, are equipped with FAA-approved testing centers for all knowledge exams. Students are encouraged to fly regularly to complete courses efficiently. Choice Aviation is dedicated to guiding aspiring pilots through their aviation journey with professionalism and excellence.

name: Cantor Air
about: Cantor Air, founded in 2007, is a leading flight school in Europe, based at the Airport "Sergio Aldo Capoferri" in Valbrembo, Italy. Established by civilian and military flight professionals, the school is dedicated to providing high-quality training according to the highest European standards. Certified as an Approved Training Organization (ATO) by E.N.A.C. and EASA, Cantor Air offers comprehensive modular training and type ratings for various aircraft. The school boasts a highly qualified staff, advanced facilities, and a varied fleet including Tecnams and a Cap10 for aerobatic flight. With a strong focus on safety and effective teaching methods, Cantor Air ensures that 90% of its students join airlines within six months of completing their courses. Commitment, excellence, and results are the core values that define Cantor Air's mission to provide exceptional aviation training.

We offer a range of licenses, including commercial pilot, multi-engine, and flight instructor certifications. Our flexible scheduling allows students to train at their own pace, and our proximity to Orlando’s theme parks makes it an ideal location for combining flight training with leisure. With over 30 years of flying experience, our owner and instructor, Captain Lucien Valier, is dedicated to making flight training accessible and enjoyable for all. Join us to embark on your aviation journey with a motivated and professional team.

Aamro Aviation provides additional ground school and seminars, and is partnered with PSI Testing Center for FAA exams. Our strategic airport locations and breathtaking infrastructure facilitate top-notch training. Safety and quality are our utmost priorities, ensuring students achieve their aviation goals in one of the most beautiful flying environments in the United States. about: ERAH Aviation Academy, located in Isparta, Turkey, has been a pinnacle of pilot training since its founding in 1991. Initially established for pesticide and fire extinguishing services, the academy transitioned to flight training in 2008 to meet the growing demand for qualified pilots. With facilities at Isparta Süleyman Demirel Airport and theoretical training in Antalya and Istanbul, ERAH offers comprehensive programs including theoretical, flight, and simulator training. The academy boasts over 20 training aircraft, modern facilities, and the latest technology simulators. Benefiting from Turkey's favorable flying conditions, allowing for 320 flying days a year, ERAH is committed to providing high-quality aviation education, making it a trusted institution for aspiring pilots. ERAH continues to pride itself on shaping the future of aviation with its experienced instructors and state-of-the-art resources.

With its ideal year-round weather and accelerated courses, Kingsky Flight Academy is dedicated to guiding aspiring pilots through every phase of their training journey. Whether you're starting or advancing your aviation skills, Kingsky's experienced team is committed to helping you achieve your goals and soar.

name: Aeroklub Ceske Republiky
about: Aeroklub Ceske Republiky is a renowned flying school in the Czech Republic, dedicated to providing comprehensive flight training since its establishment. We offer a range of courses, including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), and Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), as well as specialized training in NIGHT, IR(A), and MEP(A). Our experienced instructors and modern fleet ensure high-quality theoretical and practical training. With a strong focus on safety and regulatory compliance, we prepare students for successful careers in aviation. Join us to embark on a journey to become a professional pilot with Aeroklub Ceske Republiky.
